q1: How did Spain do in he World Cup?
a2: This article is about the country. For other uses, see Spain
q3: I think Spain lost all their games in the World Cup
a3: spain went 1-1-3 in the world cup
a4: Yes, Spain went 1-1-3 with the sole victory coming against Argentina.
q5: THEY SHOULD STOP THE TICI TAKA MODE OF PLAY
a5: I agree that Spain would benefit in being able to play more attacking and less possession style football than what results from Tiki Taka... this applies to FC Barcelona as well.
